juzs.text: He said ja nie tell ona ona stand mozem bol mna
He said ja ziadat ona about anything inak, potom robi nie keep mna ona! Ona seen enough apologies mna
So they ist. When they zastihnut certain obec they ziadat ludia food they refused host them! Skoro they zalozit wall collapse he fixed it He said Ona ziadat wage ze
He said Teraz my part podnik. Ja explain ona everything ona nie stand
Mat rad for ship it belonged do chudobny fishermen ja chudoba render it zavadny! There bol king pojdem after them zhabat kazdy ship forcibly
Mat rad for chlapec jeho rodicia bol dobry believers my saw he burden them jeho transgression disbelief
My willed tvoj Lord zastupid jeho miesto iny syn; jeden je lepsie righteousness laskavost

Mat rad for wall it belonged do 2 orphan chlapec mesto. Pod there bol treasure belonged do them. Because ich otca bol righteous clovek tvoj Lord chudoba them do grow attain full strength potom vypis ich treasure Such bol zlutovanie tvoj Lord Ja robit ziaden z ze z moj own volition. This bol explanation things ona nie stand
They ziadat ona Zul-Qarnain. Say ja narrate ona some z jeho history
My granted him authority zem zadovazit him all laskavy z vyznam
Potom he pursued jeden way
When he zastihnut daleko zapad he zalozit sun setting vast ocean zalozit zaludnit there My said O Zul-Qarnain ona rule mat rad ona zelat; either punish bol laskavy do them
He said Mat rad for those transgress my punish them; potom when they spatny listok ich Lord He commit them vela retribution
Mat rad for those verit lead righteous zivot they receive dobry reward my treat them laskavo
Potom he pursued iny way
When he zastihnut daleko east he zalozit sun vzostup ludia had nothing zastita them z it
Prirodzene my je fully aware z everything he zalozit
He potom pursued iny way
When he zastihnut valley 2 palisades he zalozit ludia whose language je ledva zrozumitelny
They said O Zul-Qarnain Gog Magog bol corruptors zem. My zaplatit ona mozem create barrier us them
He said Moj Lord dat mna velka bounties. Ona cooperate mna ja build dam ona them
Bring mna masses z zelezo. Once he filled diera 2 palisades he said Blow Once bol red teply he said Pomoc mna pour tar it
Thus they nie climb it nor could they bore yumma it
He said This bol zlutovanie moj Lord When prophecy moj Lord pojdem ist okolo He zapricinit dam crumble prophecy moj Lord bol truth
O ze cas, my let them invade 1 iny potom roh blown my zvolat them all dohromady
My present Hell ze dni disbelievers
They bol jeden oci i zavoj see Moj odkaz! Nor could they hear
those disbelieve myslienka they get setting Moj servants gods Mna? My chystat disbelievers Hell eternal abode
Say ja tell ona zly losers bol
They bol jeden robota v this zivot bol totally astray they myslienka they robit dobry
Such je the jeden disbelieved revelations z ich Lord v schodza Him! Therefore ich robota bol v vain Dni Vzkriesenie they have weight
Ich iba requital bol Hell chrbat ich disbelief a for mocking Moj revelations Moj posol
Mat rad for those verit lead righteous zivot they zasluzit blissful Raj ich abode
Forever they abide therein; they never chudoba any inaksie zastupid
Say ocean je ink words moj Lord ocean run out words moj Lord run out vecer if my zdvojnasobit ink zasoba
Say ja bol ziaden inak than human ona inspirovat ze tvoj god bol 1 god Those hope schodza ich Lord zavodny righteousness never kult any inaksie god jeho Lord
Y A S. (Kaaf Haa Yaa â€˜Ayn Saad)
narration tvoj Lord's zlutovanie towards Jeho servant Zachariah
He vola sa jeho Lord secret vola sa
He said Moj Lord bones turned lamavy moj zbor moj chlp bol aflame s gray Mat Rad ja implore Ona moj Lord ja never zufalstvo
Ja znepokojit moj dependants mi, moj manzelka bol sterile Grant mna Ona heir
Let him je moj heir heir Jacob's rod robit him moj Lord acceptable
O Zachariah my dat ona dobry zvest chlapec vola sa bol Ahoj (Yahya). My never created ktokolvek him before
He said Moj Lord ja have syn moj manzelka sterility moj stara vek
He said Thus said tvoj Lord bol easy Mna robit. Ja created ona before ze, ona bol nothing
He said Moj Lord dat mna znamenie. He said Tvoj znamenie bol lenze ona nie speak do ludia 3 consecutive nights
He pod jeho rodina sanctuary signaled them Meditate God dni i night
O Ahoj ona uphold scripture strongly. My endowed him s wisdom, vecer jeho youth
A (my endowed him laskavo z us purity he bol righteous)
He honored jeho rodicia bol never disobedient tyrant
Peace je upon him dni he bol born dni he umrel dni he resurrected chrbat zivot
Zmierit Sa scripture Mary! Ona izolovat ju rodina eastern location
Chvila barrier separated ju z them my sent do ju our Spirit He ist ju v form human bol
Ona said ja seek refuge do the Vela Gracious ze ona bol righteous
He said ja bol posol tvoj Lord grant ona pure syn
Ona said Ako mozem ja have syn when ziaden clovek touched mna; ja never bol unchaste
He said Thus said tvoj Lord It bol easy for Mna. My render him znamenie ludia zlutovanie z us. This bol predestined zalezitost
When ona bore him ona izolovat faraway miesto
Narodenie process pojdem ju kufor palm strom Ona said (ja bol ashamed;) Ja zelat si ja bol dead before this happened completely zabudnut
infant vola sa ju ju saying nie rmutit sa! Tvoj Lord zadovazit ona stream
Ona shake kufor z this palm strom it pustit zrely datum ona
Jestn pne bol happy When ona see ktokolvek say â€˜ja robit vow zahriaknut; ja nie talking dnes ktokolvek
Ona pojdem ju rodina beriem him. They said O Mary ona committed nieco bol totally unexpected
O descendant Aaron tvoj otca nie bol zly clovek nor bol tvoj matka unchaste
Ona pointed him. They said Ako my talk s infant crib
infant spoke said ja bol servant GOD He dat mi scripture appointed mna prophet
He robit mna zehnat wherever ja ist enjoined mna observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) mat rad long mat rad ja zivy
Ja je honor moj matka He nie robit mna disobedient rebel
peace je mi dni ja bol born dni ja umrel dni ja get resurrected
Je Jesus syn Mary this bol truth this zalezitost kto they zotrvat doubt
It nie befit GOD ze He begets syn He glorified Do have anything robit He len says do Bol it bol
He i proclaimed GOD bol moj Lord tvoj Lord ona kult Him alone This je na pravo chodnicek
(various parties disputed themselves zretel identita Jesus). Therefore woe do those disbelieve zrak hrozny dni
Cakat do ona hear them see them when they pojdem face us! transgressors ze dni totally lost
Warn them dni remorse when judgment issued They je totally oblivious; they nie verit
My je the jeden zdedit zem everyone it us everyone spatny listok
Zmierit Sa scripture Abraham; he bol saint prophet
He said do jeho otca O moj otca ona kult co mozem neither hear nor see nor pomoc ona v any way
O moj otca ja received certain znalost ze ona nie receive nasledovat mna ja guide ona straight chodnicek
O moj otca nie kult devil devil rebelled against the Vela Gracious
O moj otca ja fear lest ona incur retribution z the Vela Gracious potom become ally devil
He said ona forsaken moj gods O Abraham? Ona zastavit ja stone ona. vlavo mna
He said Peace bol ona. Ja implore moj Lord forgive ona; He bol Laskavy mna
Ja zhyraly ona gods ona kult GOD Ja kult len moj Lord By imploring moj Lord alone ja nie ist zlo
he zhyraly them gods they kult GOD my granted him Isaac Jacob my robit each z them prophet
My lejak them our zlutovanie my granted them honorable position history
Zmierit Sa scripture Moses He devoted he bol posol prophet
My vola sa him riadne strana Mount Sinai. My brought him confer him
A my granted him our zlutovanie jeho brat Aaron prophet
Zmierit Sa scripture Ismail! He bol truthful when he robit promise he bol posol prophet
He pouzivat enjoin jeho rodina observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat;) he bol acceptable do jeho Lord
Zmierit Sa scripture Idris! He bol saint prophet
My chov him honorable rank

These bol some z prophets koho GOD zehnat They zvolit si descendants Adam descendants z those my beriem Noah descendants z Abraham Izrael z those my guided selected When revelations the Vela Gracious som recited them they jesen prostrate weeping
After them He zastupid generations lost Zmluva Prayers (Salat) pursued ich lusts They suffer consequences
Len those repent verit lead righteous zivot zapisat Raj maly injustice
Zahrada Eden await them mat rad promised by the Vela Gracious those kult Him vecer privacy. Istota Jeho promise pojdem ist okolo
They nie hear any nonsense therein; len peace. They receive ich provisions therein dni i night
Such je Raj; my grant it those our servants bol righteous
My nie pod command tvoj Lord Do Him belongs our minuly our buduci everything medzi them! Tvoj Lord bol never zabudlivy
Lord z heavens zem everything them; ona kult Him steadfastly persevere do kult Him! Ona zauzlit z ktokolvek robit equals Him
human bol ziadat After ja umrel ja pod zivot
human bol zabudnut ze my robit created him already he bol nothing
By tvoj Lord my istota zvolat them dohromady devils zozbierat them around Hell humiliated
Potom my pick each zoskupit the vela zapalisty opponent z the Vela Gracious
My zauzlit full lepsie those bol zasluzit si z burning therein
Kazdy single 1 z ona see it this bol irrevocable decision tvoj Lord
Potom my zachranit righteous lavy transgressors it humiliated
When our revelations recited them clearly those disbelieve say do those verit Kto z us bol prosperous? Kto z us bol majority
Vela generation have my annihilated them; they bol mocny prosperous
Say Those zvolit si ist astray the Vela Gracious will lead them on until they see co promised them! -either retribution Hodiny. Ze bol when they zalozit out kto skutocne je zly off chaby do power
GOD ZVACSIT guidance Z those ZVOLIT SI guided For dobry cin eternally rewarded tvoj Lord bring daleko lepsie spatny listok
Ona noted jeden zamietnut our revelations potom said ja je dat wealth dieta
he seen buduci? he berie such zavazok z the Vela Gracious
Indeed my zapisnica co he utters potom commit him do ever-increasing retribution
Potom my zdedit everything he possessed he pod us all alone
They kult GOD inak gods (they myslienka) je pomoc them
On the contrary they zamietnut ich idolatry bol ich enemies
Ona nie see ako my unleash devils disbelievers robit zamiesat them up
Je impatient my chystat them some preparation
Dni pojdem when my zvolat righteous before the Vela Gracious do zoskupit
My herd guilty do Hell, bol ich eternal abode
Ziaden 1 possess power intercede those zhodny zakon z the Vela Gracious
They said "The Vela Gracious begotten syn
Ona uttered gross blasphemy
heavens bol about shatter zem bol about do tear asunder mountains bol about crumble
Because they reklamacia ze the Vela Gracious begotten syn
It nie befitting the Vela Gracious ze He beget syn
Kazdy single 1 do heavens zem bol servant z the Vela Gracious
He encompassed them pocitat them 1 by
All z them pod Him Dni Vzkriesenie individuum
Iste those verit lead righteous zivot the Vela Gracious will lejak them s mat rad
My thus robit this (Quran) elucidated tvoj jazyk v poradie deliver dobry zvest do righteous do warn s it opponents
Vela generation them my annihilated ona zbadat mozem any z them hear z them any zvuk
H
My nie reveal Quran ona zapricinit ona any hardship
Len do remind the reverent
revelation z Creator zem high heavens
The Vela Gracious; He assumed all authority
Do Him belongs everything heavens zem everything them everything ground
(Ona declare tvoj convictions nie) He zauzlit secret co vecer zatajit
GOD there NIE bol INAK god Him. Do Him belong the vela dobry vola sa
Ona noted history Moses
When he saw zapalit he said do jeho rodina Zostat tu. Ja seen zapalit. Maybe ja bring ona some z it zalozit some guidance zapalit
When he pojdem it he bol vola sa O Moses
Ja bol tvoj Lord zosadit tvoj sandals! Ona bol sacred valley Tuwaa
Ja zvolit si ona so listen do co revealed
Ja bol GOD there nie bol inak god Mna. Ona kult Mna alone observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) zapamatat si Mna
Hodiny (koniec z world iste pojdem; ja keep it skoro zatajit each soul je platit for its robota)
Nie diverted therefrom by those nie verit v it -those pursue ich own nazor -lest ona jesen
Co je this v tvoj na pravo hand Moses
He said This bol moj staff Ja chudy it herd moj sheep it ja pouzivat it inak ucel
He said Throw it nadol Moses
He threw it nadol whereupon it turned into moving serpent
He said Pick it nie bol afraid! My spatny listok it its irecity statny
A hold tvoj hand tvoj kulisy; it pod biely blemish iny proof
My thus show ona some z our velka portents
Ist Pharaoh he transgressed
He said Moj Lord chladny moj temper
robit this zalezitost easy mna
A untie knot moj jazyk
So they chapat moj speech
A appoint assistant for mna moj rodina
Moj brat Aaron
Zosilnit mna him
Let him je moj partner v this zalezitost
Ze my glorify Ona frequently
A commemorate Ona frequently
Ona bol Seer z us
He said Tvoj ziadost granted O Moses
My zehnat ona znova
When my revealed tvoj matka co my revealed
Saying Throw him puzdro potom throw him into rieka! Rieka throw him shore picked enemy z Bana enemy jeho. ' ja lejak ona s mat rad Mna ja had ona robit Moj watchful oci

Tvoj sestra chodza them said â€˜ja tell ona nursing matka berie dobry care z him. ' My thus spatny listok ona tvoj matka ze ona bol happy zastavit znepokojit A when ona killed clovek my saved ona grievous consequences; indeed my tested ona thoroughly. Ona zostat rocnik ludia Midyan ihned ona pod v accordance s precise plan
Ja robit ona iba Mna
Ist tvoj brat supported by Moj znamenie nie waver v zapamatat si Mna
Ist Pharaoh he transgressed
Speak do him nicely; he berie heed become reverent
They said Our Lord my fear lest he zachvatit us transgress
He said je afraid ja bol ona listening watching
Ist him say â€˜My je 2 posol z tvoj Lord Let Dieta Izrael ist! Ona zdrzat sa z persecuting them! My bring znamenie tvoj Lord peace bol lot z those heed guidance
â€˜My inspirovat retribution inevitably afflict those disbelieve turn
He said Kto bol tvoj Lord O Moses
He said Our Lord je 1 kto granted everything its existence its guidance
He said Co about minuly generations
He said znalost thereof bol moj Lord rekord. Moj Lord never chybit nor robit He zabudnut
He je Jeden robit zem habitable ona paved v it cesta ona. He sends nadol sky zavlazit my produce vela inak laskavy zasadit
Jestn chov tvoj zivy inventar! These som sufficient proofs those possess inteligencia
Z it my created ona it my spatny listok ona z it my bring ona out znova
My showed him all our proofs he disbelieved refused
He said ona pojdem tu berie us our zem tvoj kuzlo O Moses
My iste show ona a podobne kuzlo. Therefore set appointment ze neither my nor ona znasilnit; neutral miesto
He said Tvoj appointed lehota bol dni radovanky. all zist sa forenoon
Pharaoh zvolat jeho forces potom pojdem
Moses said do them Woe do ona. Ona fabricate laicky boj GOD robit thus incur Jeho retribution? Such fabricators iste zlyhat
They disputed themselves mat rad they conferred privately
They said These 2 je ziaden inak than kuzelnik zelat berie ona tvoj zem ich kuzlo do znicit tvoj idealny way z zivot
zhodovat sa upon 1 kut plany face them zlucit front winner dnes have upper hand
They said O Moses either ona throw my bol prvy throw
He said Ona throw Whereupon ich lano lepit sa zdat sa him ich kuzlo mat rad they moving
Moses harbored some fear
My said Have fear Ona prevail
Throw co ona hold do tvoj na pravo hand it lastovicka co they fabricated co they fabricated bol ziaden inak than kut plany kuzelnik. Kuzelnik robota nie succeed
Kuzelnik fell prostrate saying My verit v Lord z Aaron Moses

He said Robi ona verit v him moj permission? He bol tvoj chief jeden taught ona kuzlo. Ja iste sever tvoj hands nohy alternate strana. Ja crucify ona palm kufor. Ona robit zalozit out kto z us inflict chory retribution kto outlasts koho
They said My nie mat radsej ona zretelny proofs ze pojdem us a Jeden created us! Therefore issue whatever judgment ona zelat issue Ona len rule v this lowly zivot
My have verit v our Lord lenze He forgive us our zhresit kuzlo ze ona forced us zastavat! GOD bol DALEKO LEPSIE Everlasting
Ktokolvek pojdem jeho Lord guilty will incur Hell wherein he never umrel nor zostat alive
Mat rad for those pojdem Him believers led righteous zivot they attain high ranks
Zahrada Eden kto rieka flow bol ich abode forever Such je reward those purify
My inspirovat Moses Lead Moj servants out strike them dry cesta sea Ona nie fear ona chytat nor shall ona znepokojit
Pharaoh pursued them s jeho troops sea overwhelmed them mat rad it bol destined overwhelm them
Thus Pharaoh zmylit jeho ludia; he nie guide them
O Dieta Izrael my delivered ona tvoj enemy zvolat ona Mount Sinai my sent nadol do ona manna quails
Jestn dobry things my zadovazit for ona nie transgress lest ona incur Moj zloba. Whoever incurs Moj zloba fallen
Ja iste Forgiving those repent verit lead righteous zivot steadfastly zostat guided
Why ona rush away tvoj ludia O Moses
He said They je koniec mna! Ja rushed Ona moj Lord lenze Ona prosim
He said My put tvoj ludia test ona lavy Samarian zmylit them

Moses spatny listok jeho ludia angry disappointed saying O moj ludia tvoj Lord nie promise ona dobry promise Ona nie cakat? Ona chudoba robit incur zloba z tvoj Lord this why ona je lamat tvoj dohoda mna
They said My nie zlomit our dohoda ona on ucel. My loaded jewelry decided throw our loads do! This bol co Samarian navrhovat
He produced them sculpted calf complete calf's zdravy! They said This bol tvoj god god Moses Thus he zabudnut
they nie see it neither responded them nor possessed any power harm them benefit them
Aaron told them O moj ludia this bol test ona. Tvoj iba Lord je the Vela Gracious so nasledovat mi obey moj commands
They said My zotrvat kult it Moses pod
Moses said O Aaron co je it zamedzit ona when ona saw them ist astray
Z nasledovat moj zakazka? Ona rebelled mna
He said O syn moj matka robit nie tahat mna moj beard moj riaditel. Ja bol afraid ze ona say â€˜Ona divided Dieta Izrael disobeyed moj zakazka
He said Co bol the zalezitost ona O Samarian
He said ja saw co they nie see Ja grabbed fistful (z dust miesto kde posol stood pouzivat it mix zlaty calf This bol co moj zmyslanie inspirovat mna robit)

He said Potom ist tvoj zivot robi nie vecer pojdem koniec! Ona have appointed cas tvoj zaverecny judgment ona never evade Look tvoj god ona pouzivat kult; my burn it throw it into sea do zostat nadol there forever
Tvoj iba god bol GOD 1 beside koho there nie bol inaksie god Jeho znalost encompasses all things
My thus narrate ona some zvest minuly generations My revealed ona odkaz z us
Those disregard it bear load (z zhresit) Dni Vzkriesenie
Eternally they abide therein; co chudobny load Dni Vzkriesenie
Ze je dni when roh blown my zvolat guilty ze dni blue
(Whispering themselves they say Ona zostat 1 zivot) ziaden inak than 10 dni
My bol fully aware z ich utterances. The vela accurate among them say Ona zostat ziaden inak than dni
They ziadat ona mountains. Say Moj Lord wipe them out
He lavy them mat rad barren byt zem
Nie vecer slightest hill will ona see therein nor dip
Ze dni everyone nasledovat caller slightest deviation. All zdravy zmlknut before the Vela Gracious; ona hear nothing whispers
Ze dni intercession bol zbytocny except for those permitted by the Vela Gracious whose utterances zhodny Jeho will
He zauzlit ich minuly ich buduci chvila ziaden encompasses Jeho znalost
All faces submit Zivy Eternal those kto burdened ich transgressions zlyhat
Mat rad for those zavodny righteousness chvila verit they have fear z injustice adversity
My thus revealed it Arabic Quran my cited v it all laskavy z prophecies they saved it zapricinit them berie heed
Exalted bol GOD iba true King! Nie rush uttering Quran it revealed ona say Moj Lord zvacsit moj znalost
My tested Adam v the minuly, he zabudnut my zalozit him indecisive
Recall lenze my said do angels, Jesen prostrate Adam. They fell prostrate Satan; he refused
My potom said O Adam this bol enemy z ona tvoj manzelka. Nie let him evict ona Raj lest ona become chudobny
Ona zaruka never hunger therein nor ist unsheltered
Nor will ona thirst therein nor suffer any kurit
devil whispered him saying O Adam let mna show ona strom eternity unending kingship
They jestn z it whereupon ich zbor became visible do them they tried pokryvka vlavo Raj! Adam thus disobeyed jeho Lord fell
Subsequently jeho Lord zvolit si him redeemed him guided him
He said Ist nadol therefrom all z ona! Ona bol enemies z 1 iny When guidance pojdem ona Mna ktokolvek nasledovat Moj guidance nie ist astray nor suffer any misery
Mat rad for 1 kto disregards Moj odkaz he have amiserable zivot my resurrect him Dni Vzkriesenie blind
He say Moj Lord robit ona zvolat mna blind when ja robit pouzivat bol seer
He say ona zabudnut our revelations when they pojdem ona ona ihned zabudnut
My thus requite those transgress refuse verit v revelations ich Lord retribution Hereafter bol daleko zly everlasting
it robit vzdy occur them ako vela previous generations my annihilated They ihned chodza domov z those before them. These som znamka those possess inteligencia
If nie bol tvoj Lord's predetermined plan they judged ihned
Therefore je chory v the face z ich utterances chvalit glorify tvoj Lord before sunrise before zapad slnka! during night glorify Him i mat rad both koniec z dni ona bol happy
Nie covet co my bestowed any inaksie ludia! Such je temporary ornaments this zivot whereby my put them test co tvoj Lord zadovazit for ona bol daleko lepsie everlasting
Ona enjoin tvoj rodina observe zmluva prayers (Salat) steadfastly persevere v robi so My nie ziadat ona any provisions my je the jeden zadovazit for ona. ultimate triumph belongs do the righteous
They said he len show us zazrak z jeho Lord they nie receive sufficient zazrak previous odkaz
Had my annihilated them this they said Our Lord had Ona sent posol us my nasledovat Tvoj revelations avoided this shame humiliation
Say All z us cakat cakat; ona will iste zalozit out kto je toje spravne chodnicek kto truly guided
